column4: Does anyone know another good mailprogram than Evolution mail ?
thunderbird
yeah, load synaptic and do a package search for "thunderbird"
if you're new to linux you'll learn how wonderful synaptic is and you'll never ever dislike it :P
if you want to update it'll take several hours to get all the new files
i download with 1600kb/sk how much does it occupate?
oh, you must have the 10meg thing from insight
I have 15mbit from my ISP, but i receive about 16mbit
nice! it shouldn't take that long then
now, before you upgrade
I need to know some things: Are you going from 6.10 to 7.04 without using a CD?
Yes i dont wanna burn a cd if its not nessesary
ok
Where can I update then ?
just a sec
thank you :)
sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
Should i write that in my terminal ?
you're probably better off running update-manager
I think sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list is a bit difficult to me
yes, follow what soundray is telling you. The method I was about to suggest is the hard way :P
